ai-patthana21.11:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.11:1.1_0: Defiled by defilements, profiled with the teaching, not hindered by defilements, for a reason.
ai-patthana21.11:1.1_1: Defiled by defilements, defiled, and skilled in the teaching of the skillful. Skilled in the skillful is a condition for cause.
ai-patthana21.11:2.1_0: Defiled by defilements, profit, skilled in the teaching, skilled in terminology, skilled indicate, and skilled in sequence.
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_0: Defiled by defilements, not committed to defilement, or by not grasping.
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_1: Defiled by defilements, defiled influence, and undefiled freedom by wisdom in this very life, that gives rise to cause.
